overview:
David Amerland is the author of the best-selling ‘SEO Help: 20 steps to get your website to Google’s #1 page’. He has written a number of practical books on online marketing and business. He trained as a Chemical Engineer before making the leap to journalism, fusing hard, factual analysis with communication.

As a journalist he worked for ‘The European’ before freelancing and then leaping into the corporate communications sector for the John Lewis Partnership in the UK.

He has helped business as diverse as major food importers in Greece and real estate advertisers in Texas to streamline their business model, refine their working practices and use the web to gain higher visibility and healthier bottom lines.

He has spent time living and working in Australia, Britain, the US and Greece.

video_embeds.description: David Amerland on what it is that motivates us to get through each day.
